caption: This video introduces the lifestyle of ants, including their survival skills in deserts and snowy mountains, as well as their body structure and family relationships. Ants have survival skills in deserts and snowy mountains. Ants can find paradise in the desert and survive with just a few hours of eating and drinking. Ants live underground and provide an early warning system. The body structure of ants adapts to different survival environments. Ants have relatives who also live in grasslands, but ants primarily live in deserts. The body structure and family relationships of ants help them survive. Ants have enemies, including ancient ants with mysterious biological characteristics. The body structure of ants also helps them resist attacks from enemies. Ants survival skills family relationships enemies body structure desert snowy mountains.
